ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.elasticsearch

Class ESHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.elasticsearch.ESHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public class ESHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler
    This class implements the Handler interface which specifies a contract for a class that will store and retrieve Story objects from some sort of storage. The ESHandler will use Elastic Search to store stories online so that users may interact with one-another.
